name: picsur
tagline: A self-hosted image hosting service with modern UI
description: Picsur is a self-hosted image hosting service that allows users to upload and manage pictures with expiration, album support, and direct links in a modern interface.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload and host images with direct links for embedding in websites and applications

features.title: User Accounts
features.description: Create accounts to manage personal image collections and upload history

features.title: Shareable Links
features.description: Generate permanent or temporary links to share images publicly or privately

features.title: REST API
features.description: Upload and manage images programmatically using a RESTful API
